## LiquidationDetails interface

Details of a [liquidate()](./stablecoin-lib-base.transactableprotocol.liquidate.md) or [liquidateUpTo()](./stablecoin-lib-base.transactableprotocol.liquidateupto.md) transaction.

```typescript
export interface LiquidationDetails 
```
